Dire Wolf Pelt

armor (lvl 2)

item id [id]: 210
armor id [armor]: 176 (Dire Wolf Pelt)
protection, body [protbody]: 8
defence [def]: +1
encumbrance [enc]: 1
attack [att]: +1
resist cold [coldres]: +5

Requires 5N to forge (N1)

This enchanted dire wolf pelt is very light and will increase the battle skill of its wearer as well as protect him from cold.
